label: calculatedPrice
comment: A calculated price for this experience event.
A calculated price for this experience product.
A calculated price for this specified experience item.

rangeIncludes.comment: A sum of money for which something is or may be bought or sold for trade purposes.

domainIncludes.comment: An involvement in an experience program in which some thing happens, such as a nature watching, woodware manufacturing, meditation, holiday trip, dinner, theme park visit, could be experienced.
A collection of information specific to the involvement of a person or persons in a happening, such as a theme park, a guided tour being used or reported on for trade purposes.
Any service that provides an involvement, such as an adventure experience, wellness experience, social or business activity experience.
